mapper.sql: ID, ParentID, ProjectID, `Name`, `Enable`, ImagePath, ExValue, DisplayOrder, CreateTime, CreateUserID, UpdateTime, UpdateUserID
mapper.insert: insert into tb_monitor_group (ParentID, ProjectID, `Name`, `Enable`, ImagePath, ExValue, DisplayOrder, CreateTime, CreateUserID, UpdateTime, UpdateUserID) values (#{parentID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{imagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{exValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{displayOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER})

ParentID,
ProjectID,
`Name`,

mapper.update:
update tb_monitor_group
ParentID = #{parentID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ProjectID = #{projectID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`Name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`Enable` = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT},
ImagePath = #{imagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ExValue = #{exValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DisplayOrder = #{displayOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CreateUserID = #{createUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
UpdateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UpdateUserID = #{updateUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_monitor_group set ParentID = #{parentID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ProjectID = #{projectID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `Name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `Enable` = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, ImagePath = #{imagePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ExValue = #{exValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DisplayOrder = #{displayOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreateTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CreateUserID = #{createUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UpdateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UpdateUserID = #{updateUserID,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{ID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select * from tb_monitor_group
ProjectID = #{projectID}
and `Name` like concat('%', #{groupName}, '%')
and ParentID is null
and id in (select MonitorGroupID from tb_monitor_group_item where MonitorItemID = #{monitorItemID})
and id in (select ParentID from tb_monitor_group where ParentID is not null and `Name` like concat('%', #{secondaryGroupName}, '%'))
order by id desc

select * from tb_monitor_group where ParentID in
#{id}

select * from tb_monitor_group
ProjectID = #{projectID}
and `Name` like concat('%', #{groupName}, '%')
and ParentID is null
and id in (select MonitorGroupID from tb_monitor_group_item where MonitorItemID = #{monitorItemID})
and id in (select ParentID from tb_monitor_group where ParentID is not null and `Name` like concat('%', #{secondaryGroupName}, '%'))
order by id desc

SELECT tmg.ID groupID, tmg.`Name` groupName, tmg.`Enable` enable FROM tb_monitor_group tmg LEFT JOIN tb_monitor_group_item tmgi ON tmg.ID = tmgi.MonitorGroupID LEFT JOIN tb_monitor_item tmi ON tmi.ID = tmgi.MonitorItemID WHERE tmi.`Name` LIKE CONCAT('%',#{monitorItemName},'%') AND tmg.ProjectID=#{projectID}

SELECT tmp.ID monitorPointID, tmp.`Name` monitorPointName, tmp.`Enable` monitorPointEnable, tmt.MultiSensor multiSensor, tmg1.ID monitorGroupID, tmg1.`Name` monitorGroupName, tmg1.`Enable` monitorGroupEnable, tmg2.ID monitorGroupParentID, tmg2.`Name` monitorGroupParentName, tmg2.`Enable` monitorGroupParentEnable, ts.ID sensorID, ts.`Name` sensorName, ts.Alias sensorAlias FROM tb_monitor_point tmp LEFT JOIN tb_monitor_type tmt ON tmt.MonitorType = tmp.MonitorType LEFT JOIN tb_monitor_group_point tmgp ON tmgp.MonitorPointID = tmp.ID LEFT JOIN tb_monitor_group tmg1 ON tmg1.ID = tmgp.MonitorGroupID LEFT JOIN tb_monitor_group tmg2 ON tmg1.ParentID = tmg2.ID LEFT JOIN tb_sensor ts ON ts.MonitorPointID = tmp.ID WHERE tmg1.ID IS NOT NULL AND tmg2.ID IS NOT NULL AND tmp.ProjectID =#{projectID}
